title: Ontology-Based Sustainable Energy Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics (algebra, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: Parallel operation of a smartphone-based mobile learning platform and weekly offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret mathematical models of sustainable energy systems according to ontology structures.
Learners can process data using regression analysis and simulation tools for energy efficiency calculations.
Learners can apply a mathematical decision-making framework in team-based problem-solving processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
